items.summary: Switch the frontend publishing configuration from Draft Mode to Live Mode for the production build by setting the publishing environment variable to live (VITE_PUBLISHING_STATE=live) and ensuring draft-only UI elements are not shown.
Ensure the robots meta policy behaves correctly in Live Mode so search engines can index the site: in live mode set robots to "index, follow"; in draft/maintenance set robots to "noindex, nofollow".

Add/adjust frontend environment configuration files/documentation so it is straightforward to publish live (e.g., provide a live env configuration alongside the existing draft env configuration) without requiring code changes.
